storyInfo: Exusiai is forced to dismantle her bombs when she realizes that the Shrine of Nurtury is full of innocent refugees. During the process, she unexpectedly runs into Lemuen, who is there to investigate. At the same time, Federico finds Arturia, and both of them seem to sense something unusual stirring in Laterano.

attributes.content: Why are you leaning against the wall in a weird pose? I thought I was looking at a statue.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You could have heard my joints crack if you came in earlier.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I should pay a visit to an artificer, see if I can't get some cushioning for my waist.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I'm not sure the gun-knight armorsmiths take into account the special needs of the elderly.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Young gun-knights need it too! It helps mitigate the recoil from our guns!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The Nativity is tomorrow. How are preparations at the Shrine of Nurtury?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The mother is in stable condition. Andoain has taken good care of her. She will give birth to a healthy, beautiful infant tomorrow.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Wiš'adel and the Kazdelian delegation, the Twin Empresses and the Leithanian delegation, the delegation from the Ægir Institute of Development Planning, the Tianshi delegation led by Yan's Envoy of Ceremonial Rites...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Tomorrow, all the visitors to the Holy City are invited to the Shrine of Nurtury to witness the birth of a new life.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Why did you need me, then, if everything is in order?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Our newest cardinal...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Lemuen?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: She came to see the Matriarch. I'm wondering—
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Did she 'happen' to pass by as she was investigating the bombings, 'drop in' to take a look, and then propose to provide help to the Shrine of Nurtury on a 'whim'?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: At first, I thought she came because of the attack on Andoain. But when I saw the look on her face after she saw the Matriarch... it is clear that she has suspicions.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I thought I quelled those.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Lemuen possesses a keen edge that few others have, especially when focused on a single matter. There is certainly no better fit for a cardinal of the Seventh Tribunal.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: At the same time, there is also no worse fit. More often than not, she relies solely on her own judgment when it comes to where she will focus her attention.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Do we need to be on guard against her?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You make us sound like some evil organization plotting to overthrow Laterano.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Who is to say?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: For some, the future that we usher in will overturn life as they know it.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Our empathy, our kindred and family, even the concept of 'Sankta' itself... existing limitations will be cast aside.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: This should have been the predetermined end of Laterano's path, but the path has gone on far too long.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Some people take the accidents that happened in the process as the norm, and now they can't accept the predetermined end.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: That is correct.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: We should prepare early.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I'll deal with Lemuen. You head back to the Shrine of Nurtury and get ready for tomorrow's ceremony.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: May the Lord's blessings be with this city.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The red-headed Sankta runs through a forest of white and blue, like a tiny flame flickering in the rain.
That cloud on that comfort bell is almost the size of Croissant's van... and a cradle large enough to hold two cargo containers...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The clouds hanging upon the comfort bells seem to block out the sunlight, and the hands holding up the cradles reaching towards the clouds.
In this place, every living thing appears small and insignificant.
Huh?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What the heck...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It feels so empty and quiet, but more than half of these nurseries are occupied...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Children, outsiders, even Fallen Angels... the Nurturers are busy. Looks like they've been living here for a while.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Didn't they say most of the facilities are emtpy and will only open to the public when that ceremony is done?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That's not true at all!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I have to recover the bombs!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I thought I could stop the ceremony by blowing up the venue, but this place is full of people...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: To think I went through all that effort to slip past the guards...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...I wish the girls were here.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas could've knocked out all the guards and dragged them outside, or Croissant could've barged into the rooms and packed up everyone inside...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Or I could just get the boss to do a meet-and-greet opposite the ceremony to draw everybody's attention...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ugh, forget it. There's no time, I gotta get to work...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'll take these bombs apart and think of another way—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It'll be easier if you cut the blue wire first.
Whah...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: When did you get back?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: El.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: An entirely unremarkable apartment, except for the fact that its roof offers a perfect view of the plaza in front of the Shrine of Nurtury.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Is that why you chose to hide here, Arturia?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Another happy reunion.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: And much sooner than I expected.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You did not attempt to conceal your trail.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The paper dragonfly was a clear clue. I saw you use such musical Arts more than once in Zwillingstürme.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Well, I hate to admit it...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But you've learned a whole lot of my secrets, Fede.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Wait, you...?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Did our executor here not tell you that I am his beloved soror, Sister Hildegard?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: You are my distant relative. And that does not impede me from exercising oversight over you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Before I brought you back to Laterano, on the outskirts of Zwillingstürme, I warned you—
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I will increase my vigilance over you in order to determine the subjective motivations and possible objective consequences of your actions.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And I will shoot to kill if I find anything suspicious.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I remember the sunset that day.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: So hardheaded he's fun, isn't he, Sister Hildegard?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You were always cooperative, Arturia. That's why Landen Monastery gave you a degree of leeway.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: You deceived us!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I apologize, Sister.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I hope my impertinence will not be detrimental to you or to Landen Monastery.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Why did you leave Landen Monastery without permission, Arturia?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Look at this shrine, Fede.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: So vast, so full of vitality. It reaches into the clouds, surpassing even the eponymous twin towers of Zwillingstürme in Leithanien...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Is this the 'grace' and 'authority' that Laterano wants to build?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Look at the haloless outsiders being guided inside.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What are Laterano's plans for them?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What have you found, Arturia?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Do you remember our short stay at Rhodes Island before returning to Laterano?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I met a mysterious guest there, who told me that there may come a day when Laterano is no longer a warm, cozy little cottage for the Sanktas.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Fede, Sister Hildegard. Look at what lies before you. Do you not suspect that the day has come?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What has become of the Holy City that we were so proud of?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Wh-What do you mean?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: You are ever vigilant, Fede. You must have noticed something, no?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Otherwise, you would have greeted me with the barrel of your gun.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Are those bombs?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: They look pretty powerful.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Sis! You're walking again?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hooray!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Was it you that I saw on Via Jovita, and that Amos saw outside the firearms workshop?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: How did you manage to make so many bombs despite the Curia's strict control of explosive materials...? You're as good at this as ever.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Alright. Spit it out, El. What are you trying to do?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Blow up the shrine?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Stop the Nativity?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Or sabotage the whole Summit of Nations?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Stay back, sis.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: A massive pillar cuts the light and shadow open. Lemuen stops in her tracks, keeping her distance from Exusiai.
That's a cardinal's cassock you're wearing, isn't it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Does it look good on me?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Totally! It's so cool!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It was a little loose around the waist when I got it the day before my creation. I had to stay up all night fixing it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Ugh, I wish I wasn't wearing this for our reunion.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Did you come back by yourself, or do you have friends with you?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hah, you're pumping me for information now?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You're a simple girl, after all. You're not in a school, and this isn't a graduation ceremony. Did you really just decide to liven things up like this on your own?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Who's behind you, and why did they put you up to this?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hey, let's try this—'Apple pie with mayonnaise!'
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: 'Had a slice, want another.'
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You remembered!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: When we had a fight that wasn't going anywhere or a secret we didn't want to share, that's our password to set things aside.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I can feel your emotions, El. Agitation, impatience, worry, not even knowing how to explain...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But my job is to capture the culprits who are trying to sabotage the Summit of Nations. I will file a request with the Curia to personally handle the follow-up to this case.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The Sankta sisters stand off against one another, neither making a single move, nor speaking a single word. It is Lemuen who finally breaks the silence with a sigh.
*sigh*...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: In that instant, Exusiai flies toward her and hugs her tightly.
Now that's the reaction I know from an El in trouble.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I missed you, sis!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's been a while. Have you grown?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Of course not! I was almost an adult when I left Laterano!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You don't have to talk like you're my mom, sis.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Is that what I sound like?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Did you tie your hair yourself? It's coming loose.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Let me tie it for you... still careless as ever.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Of course, I'm not as good as you at that.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What are you doing here, anyway? Don't tell me you knew I would show up?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just reviewing the shrine's security measures... I thought it was remarkable enough to see the Matriarch praying for a pregnant Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: And then I ran into you.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Matriarch... pregnant Sarkaz... praying...?)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Could the Nativity be...?)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So you don't know what's in this shrine either?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh, is it your turn to pump me for information?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Who taught you to do that?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I didn't turn bad, I promise! The people who're supporting me now—they're a good influence, I promise!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm not alone, and I'm not being used.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There's a lot that's wrong here, but it's hard to explain... I need more time.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'll come home after I've done what I have to!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Lemuen ties one last knot with the string, then pushes up slightly so the strand of hair on the side of her sister's head will not come loose so easily.
The next instant, she finds that her arms are empty.
I'll leave the disarming of the bombs to you, sis—I mean, Your Eminence!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Lemuen hears the ticking of bomb countdowns in all directions. She looks in the direction where her sister disappeared, but is in no position to give chase.
She never changes, does she?
attributes.name: Lemuen
